title: "Hugo is great" italic fat face w/ swashes
content:
Hi everybody, I really need some help to find out this two type faces.

thanks everybody!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105709/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_243.png) | 48.21 KB |
author: Pedro Henrique Gomes

comments.content:
Hugo looks like Leitura to me.  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/leitura-display/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105709/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/leitura-display/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/leitura-display/")

Edit: Display Italic, that is, with swashes.

The small text is ITC Souvenir, I think.  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-souvenir/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105709/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-souvenir/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-souvenir/")

Thanks!!!!!  
You donâ€™t know how much you helped me.

Pedro Henrique
